mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Buckingham, Catharinus P. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling 9 1862. By Telegraph from Washn 9 1862. Your Quota of three hundred thousand (300,000) militia is four thousand six hundred & fifty four (4654) regulations for draft will be forwarded to-day by order of[crossed out] Secy of War CP Buckingham Brig Genl & A.A.G. 27Qwchg adjt Genls Ofs B
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
Washington, D. C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
